tool_description: Searches comprehensive etymological databases for word origins, historical forms, and established etymological information.

word.description: Word to look up etymological information for

include_cognates.description: Whether to include cognate information in results

historical_depth.description: How far back to trace etymology: shallow, medium, deep

error_messages: Word not found: The specified word is not present in available etymological databases.
Language not supported: Etymological data for this language is not available.
Invalid historical depth: Use 'shallow', 'medium', or 'deep' for historical_depth parameter.
Database connection failed: Unable to access etymological database resources.
Ambiguous word form: Multiple entries found - specify more context or use a more specific form.
usage: Provide a word and language to retrieve comprehensive etymological information. Adjust parameters to control the scope and depth of results.

etymology_summary.description: Concise summary of the word's etymology

historical_forms.description: Historical forms of the word in chronological order

source_language.description: Ultimate source language or language family

certainty_level.description: Scholarly certainty level of the etymology
